title: Beach Baby
description:
The secret beach is my happy place.

Until the handsome developer threatens to ruin it all.

I live a simple life. I work in a nursing home and read romance novels. But there is one thing that brings adventure to my days—the secret strip of beach that I tripped over one day.It’s magic. So beautiful, my heart hurts. And now I need to save it from a soulless property developer.Gideon Black may be gorgeous. Older and sinfully attractive, with an air of command. But none of that matters—I must protect the beach.When he agrees to meet with me, I can’t believe it. And when he asks me to dinner, my head spins.Focus, Olivia. I won’t be distracted. And besides—it’s a business meeting.That’s all.
Beach Baby is a short and steamy instalove story, starring a determined young heroine and the powerful developer she brings to his knees.
author: Cassie Mint
